verbs.description: [ARG0: snow and sleet] [V: make] [ARG1: an early appearance] [ARGM-LOC: in central indiana] weather can change fast in the hoosier state and that was evident friday although indiana was experiencing record heat in the beginning of october this week cold front brought the temperatures down into the 30s among the rain friday evening some people spotted sleet and even snow fall in parts of the state viewer angélica maría morales shared a video of large wet snow flakes falling in west lafayette while david arnold captured sleet hitting the hood of a vehicle in carmel indiana snow
